GSILabs.BModel

Interface Event

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImpermanentEvent, LastingEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Concert, Exhibition, Festival

    public interface Event
    An event is any happening for which a ticket can be purchased.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Date[] getDates()
      Returns the date or dates the Event takes place at.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name associated with the event
      Performer[] getPerformers()
      Returns a list of the performers involved in the Event, either they take part in all of its activities or not.
      boolean involvesPerformer(Performer p)
      Checks whether the performer p is somehow involved in the Event, either individually or as part of a collective.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name associated with the event
        Returns:
        The name of the event.

      • getDates

        java.util.Date[] getDates()
        Returns the date or dates the Event takes place at.
        Returns:
        return the 1+ dates trhough which the event spans

      • involvesPerformer

        boolean involvesPerformer(Performer p)
        Checks whether the performer p is somehow involved in the Event, either individually or as part of a collective.
        Parameters:
        p - The performer
        Returns:
        true if an only if the event is correct and the performer is involved in it.

      • getPerformers

        Performer[] getPerformers()
        Returns a list of the performers involved in the Event, either they take part in all of its activities or not.
        Returns:
        An array with the performers that take part in the event.
